text: Chazey-Bons is a commune. It is found in the region Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. On 1 January 2017, the former commune of Pugieu was merged into Chazey-Bons.Arrêté préfectoral 30 June 2016 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ain department == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Communes in Ain
title: Chazey-Bons
